Hotel.name: Hotel Bristol Berlin (Formerly Kempinski Hotel Bristol)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Kempinski Hotel Bristol Berlin, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, steps from Kaethe Kollwitz Museum and minutes from The Story of Berlin. This 5-star hotel is close to Reichstag Building and Brandenburg Gate.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 301 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-out. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has 21528 square feet (2000 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 301 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Kempinski Hotel Bristol Berlin, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, steps from Kaethe Kollwitz Museum and minutes from The Story of Berlin. This 5-star hotel is close to Reichstag Building and Brandenburg Gate.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kaethe Kollwitz Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
The Story of Berlin - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Theatre of the West - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Europa Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Berlin Zoo - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
KaDeWe - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Technical University - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Deutsche Oper Berlin - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Schaubuehne - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Bauhaus Archive - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Grips-Theater - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Victory Column - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Bellevue Palace - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Schoneberg City Hall - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 17.9 km / 11.1 mi

The preferred airport for Kempinski Hotel Bristol Berlin is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Plese note that Continental Breakfast is served from 08:00am till 11:00am daily.The hotel pool area including sauna, steam bath and mini gym will be closed due to maintenance and renovations from 17 July including 20 August 2017.
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room 1
Check in time: 3pmCheck out time: 12pm
Notice
Please note that from the 1st January 2014 the German government will apply a 5% city tax per room, in Berlin, to all guests travelling for tourist purposes. This 5% city tax will not be included in our rates, it will be paid at time of check-out.
